channel.title: Project Viral | Massive Pking | 317 | Great Community!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/3194/7rjj.jpg[/img]
[B][SIZE=5]- Links -[/SIZE][/B]
[URL=http://"viralscape.forumotion.com"][B]Forums[/B][/URL]
[URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/192517812/Project%20Viral%20Client.rar"][B]Client Download[/B][/URL]
[B]- Introduction -[/B][/CENTER]
This server was made after a server I remember called Decimation 317. I loved pking on that server, and I never found one just like it. So, I decided to make my own. It's pretty similar in a lot of ways. I did my best to bring it to life, but we will just have to see how the players like it! I hope you all atleast try it out!
[center][b]Images[/b][/center] [center][IMG]http://i577.photobucket.com/albums/ss216/kingsnake190/hfh_zpsd8e46762.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i577.photobucket.com/albums/ss216/kingsnake190/645754_zps2d448e49.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i577.photobucket.com/albums/ss216/kingsnake190/kjhhkjhhhlhjkjkj_zpsd38da257.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i577.photobucket.com/albums/ss216/kingsnake190/ohjjhjhjh_zpsab4c60ae.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i577.photobucket.com/albums/ss216/kingsnake190/4567h_zps1a748aa3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i577.photobucket.com/albums/ss216/kingsnake190/nkhgghjg_zpsd6beaf90.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i577.photobucket.com/albums/ss216/kingsnake190/543643643643_zps55490c1a.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i577.photobucket.com/albums/ss216/kingsnake190/686_zps2722751a.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i577.photobucket.com/albums/ss216/kingsnake190/868686_zps8a44b4de.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i577.photobucket.com/albums/ss216/kingsnake190/757_zpsea3b04e0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i577.photobucket.com/albums/ss216/kingsnake190/6546546546_zpsab1f2cce.png[/img][/center]
Updates!
8-1-13
- Server -
Reworked shops Re-did some prices Added thieving stalls to home Added control panel Took out barrows shop Made donator shop only for donators Made some items donator only Added imbued rings Now able to use Eclipse with the server Fixed Vesta body
- Client -
Made it so cache automatically downloads Added acouple of new models for items Changed background image
8-2-13
- Server -
Added PC Added interfaces for PC Added shop to PC (contains fighter torso/void/fighter hat) Added random event for thieving stalls Finished adding Torva, Virtus, and Pernix Added comp cape rack Added cracker on player Added a lot of other stuff but can't remember...
- Client -
Added jar for client Update Cache Changed background picture of client
8-4-13
- Server -
Fixed a bug with shops Took out .25x price Added new teleports Changed teleports Finished up forums Added webclient information to serer(need new forums) Added voting to server(new new forums)
8-5-13
- Server -
Added teletabs (house,ardy,fally) Changed home Moved npcs Added stalls to ardy Added thieving random

item.title: Project Viral | Massive Pking | 317 | Great Community!

item.description:
@kingsnake190 wrote:

bloodloss-x:

“Great community” But your the only player atm? Good luck anyways

More people that join the faster it will become a great community.

Read full topic

- Introduction -[/CENTER]

This server was made after a server I remember called Decimation 317. I loved pking on that server, and I never found one just like it. So, I decided to make my own. It’s pretty similar in a lot of ways. I did my best to bring it to life, but we will just have to see how the players like it! I hope you all atleast try it out!
